newsitem.title: LATVIA: Daugavpils Chain, RTF star on Latvian bourse.
newsitem.headline: Daugavpils Chain, RTF star on Latvian bourse.

text.p: Secondary list firm Daugavpils Chain and official list company Riga Transport Fleet starred on the Latvian bourse on Thursday, where overall volume was slightly higher and most prices again rose.
Daugavpils traded a big 251,307 lats as it fell to 2.11 lats from 2.48 lats and RTF traded 110,457 lats and gained to 1.81 lats from 1.58 lats. Overall turnover was 586,160 lats.
Usual market leader Unibanka turned over 37,616 lats as it dipped to 3.20 lats from 3.25 lats. Staburadze gained to three lats from 2.70 lats on 31,053 lats.
Other active secondary market stocks included fish cannery Salacgriva on turnover of 66,231 lats for a gain to 5.40 lats from 4.70 lats.
Kaija traded 24,436 lats and dipped to 2.15 lats from 2.25 lats while Rigas Raugs rose to 4.78 lats from 4.16 lats on trade of 17,193 lats.
Roja fish cannery turned over 16,560 lats as it fell to 2.30 lats from 2.70 lats and the Lode Brick factory rose to 2.06 lats from 2.05 lats on business of 10,815 lats.
Jekabpils Sugar gained two santimes to 60 santimes on activity of 8,760 lats.
